name: U.S. Adventure
overview: United States Adventure is an educational game, that takes place entirely in the USA. You walk from state to state and have to find out when important events happened in each state. You gain score by knowing what direction to move to go to different states or for different events. You also have an inventory of helpful items but if you select an event that didn't occur in a certain state you will lose score and may lose stuff from your inventory.
